Translations.Text: ane ni:Sanka ame ja musa (a.Sa.)Ne potani ayato ane prakasita purava sathe mokalya hatam
phira'auna ane tena saradaro pase, to pana te loko'e phira'aunana adesonum anusarana karyum ane phira'aunano ko'i adesa barabara na hato
te to kayamatana divase potani koma same avi te darekane jahannamamam la'i jase, te ghani ja kharaba khina che jena para te'one lavavamam avase
temana para to a duniyamam pana la'anata (phitakara) nakhi didhi ane kayamatana divase pana, kharaba inama che je te'one apavamam avase
vasti'oni a ketalika janakari jenum ame tamari samaksa varnana kari rahya che temanthi to ketalika hajara che ane ketalaka (ni upajo) kapa'i ga'i che

Ame temana para kami pana atyacara nathi karyo parantu temane ja pote potana para atyacara karyo ane temane temana pujyo'e kami phayado na pahoncadayo jemane te'o allaha sivaya pokari rahya hata, jyare tamara palanaharano adesa avi gayo parantu temane temanamam nukasanamam vadharo kari didho
tamara palanaharani pakadani a ja rita che, ke te vasti'ona rahevasi manthi atyacari'one pakade che, ni:Sanka teni pakada du:Kha apanari ane khuba ja sakhata che
ni:Sanka amam te loko mate sikhamana che je loko kayamatani yatanathi dare che, te divasa jemam dareka lokone bhega karavamam avase ane te, evo divasa che jemam saune hajara karavamam avase
te (kayamatana divasa)ne ame dura kari rahya che, te phakata eka nakki karela samaya sudhi che
je divase te avi jase, te divase ko'i pana vyakti allahani paravanagi vagara vata pana nahim kari sake, to temam ko'i duracari hase ane ko'i sadacari
parantu je duracari hase te jahannamamam hase tyam ciso ane rado padase
te temam hammesa rahevavala che, jyam sudhi akaso ane dharati baki rahese, te samaya sudhi jyam tamaro palanahara icche. Ni:Sanka tamaro palanahara je kami icche te kari le che
parantu je loko sadacari hase, te jannatomam hase jyam hammesa rahese jyam sudhi akasa ane dharati baki rahese, te samaya sudhi jyam tamaro palanahara icche. A aganita maphi che

etala mate tame te vastu'o vise sankamam na raheso, jemani a loko puja kari rahya che, temani puja to evi che jevi temana purvajoni a pahela hati, ame te darekane temano purepuro bhaga, kami karya vagara api da'isum
